title: Array
summary: An array is an ordered collection of data (either primitive or object depending upon the language). Arrays are used to store multiple values under a single variable name. A regular variable, on the other hand, can store only one value.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
